ctfs.description:
LakeCTF is the first CTF hosted by polygl0ts (and friends), the CTF team of EPFL.
For the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the IC Faculty at EPFL we organize a CTF with on-site finals.
Challenge Categories : Pwn, Rev, Crypto, Web, and Misc

DownUnderCTF is the largest online Australian run Capture The Flag (CTF) competition with over 4000+ registered users and over 2100+ registered teams (2021). Its main goal is to try to up-skill the next generation of potential Cyber Security Professionals and increase the CTF community's size here in Australia. Prizes are only for Australian Secondary or Tertiary school students. However, our CTF is online and open for anyone to play worldwide.
We hope to see you all from the 23rd to the 25th of September!
Infra sponsored by g.co/cloud

SEC-T is an affordable, non-profit, English speaking, two days, single track information security/hacking conference taking place in late summer every year in Stockholm, Sweden.
This is the CTF competition for SEC-T 2022, aka. SEC-T 0x0Expand.

CakeCTF is a *casual* Jeopardy-style Capture The Flag competition hosted by yoshiking, theoremoon, and ptr-yudai. There will be some challenges of pwn, web, rev, crypto, and so on. These challenges range in difficulty from beginner to intermediate level.
Infra sponsored by goo.gle/ctfsponsorship
Registration: https://balsnctf.comOrganizers: Balsn (https://balsn.tw/)Twitter: @balsnctf (https://twitter.com/balsnctf)

Maple Bacon's inaugural CTF! Featuring web, pwn, rev, crypto and more.
Prizes sponsored by https://zellic.ioInfrastructure sponsored by https://goo.gle/ctfsponsorship
Date: Aug 27, 00:00 UTC to Aug 29, 00:00 UTC
Discord link: https://discord.gg/YnqKwXuwnP

Midnight Sun CTF is HackingForSoju's annual CTF event to promote competition around the world.
WHEN and WHEREThe final event is in Sweden from August 20th - 21st, with the online qualifier running from April 2nd - 3rd.
https://discord.gg/xMuRxub4CX

!! Registrations Open !!A beginner-friendly CTF, Hosted By S.H.E.L.L : Cybersecurity Club of VNIT.With an objective to get the enthusiastic students familiar with the basics, along with a few hard and fun challenges for the professionals.
The challenges will range from Easy to Hard in difficulty and will be segregated into topics :- Cryptography- Reverse Engineering- Web Security- Forensics- Miscellaneous 
Sponsored By: Burp bounty pro and Zsecurity

WeCTF is a Web-only CTF that has both intro-level challenges and diabolical ones.
Infra sponsored by goo.gle/ctfsponsorship

m0leCon CTF 2022 Teaser is an online jeopardy-style CTF organized by pwnthem0le. Top 5 teams will be invited to the final event, that will take place in Fall 2022 at Politecnico di Torino, alongside with the m0leCon conference.
Finals will be also open to everyone that takes part in the conference, up to the capacity of the rooms.
info: [email protected]

San Diego CTF, also known as SDCTF, is an annual Capture the Flag competition hosted by undergraduates at the University of California, San Diego (UCSD). The competition will be jeopardy-style and run in the 48 hour period from May 6 to May 8, 2022. We encourage participation from teams on and off campus, of all ages and backgrounds.
This event is hosted yearly by ACM Cyber, the chief cybersecurity organization on campus at UC San Diego. This yearly competition allows us to train our members, build our internal resources, and give back to the greater cybersecurity community.
There is no team size limit and we use static scoring. Challenges vary across the disciplines of Open Source Intelligence, Cryptography, Web Hacking, Reverse Engineering, Binary Exploitation, Jail Escapes, Forensic Analysis, and others. At the end of a 48 hour period, the teams participating are ranked by number of points, with ties broken by who reached that number of points first.
Infra sponsored by goo.gle/ctfsponsorship.

Geared primarily towards high school students but with a very wide range of challenge difficulty. A huge thanks to our sponsors, Trail of Bits, OtterSec, and Binary Ninja for making this all possible. Infra sponsored by goo.gle/ctfsponsorship.

From the developers of VirSecCon, [email protected], BsidesBOS, GRIMMCon CTF and more, we bring you NahamCon CTF 2022!
Registration for the CTF is accessible at https://ctf.nahamcon.com 
For information on the NahamCon conference, check out https://nahamcon.com
Special thank you to all of the events sponsors!

Incognito 3.0 is a CTF competition being held in the Equinox-Annual Technical Fest of IIIT Lucknow. It is open for participants all around the globe to take part in and win exciting prizes.
Sponsored By Equinox

Friday, April 15th 12:00 PM CST to Sunday, April 17th 12:00 PM CST.
Texas A&M University CTF event.
This CTF is geared more towards university and high school students, but anyone may compete!
https://cybersecurity.tamu.edu/
Discord: https://discord.gg/8DFfzbnj

Plaid CTF :: Hosted by Plaid Parliament of Pwning
April 8 21:00 UTC - April 9 21:00 UTC

Midnight Sun CTF is HackingForSoju's annual CTF event to promote competition around the world.
WHEN and WHEREThe final event is in Sweden from June 18th - 19th, with the online qualifier running from April 2nd - 3rd.
https://discord.gg/xMuRxub4CX

The third zer0pts CTF event is coming this March!
What you'll see: exciting challenges of varying difficulty and categories (pwn, crypto, web, reversing, and misc)What you'll never see: guessy challenges
Duration: 36 hours from March 19th (Saturday) 00:00 UTC
FooBarCTF is a 24 hrs world-wide Capture The Flag (CTF) competition organized by a group of InfoSec enthusiasts from NIT Durgapur during Aarohan, the annual techno-management fest of NIT Durgapur.

RULES
1. CODEGATE 2022 CTF runs in 3 division : Junior, University, General
2. Qualification of participation- Junior Division    Solo exhibition     Participants are limited to those born after 2003- University Division    Maximum team size is 4 members    University students    Only for Republic of Korea University (In other case is General Division)    There is a validation process for the teams that advance to the final round- General Divison     Maximum team size is 4 members     Everyone else
3. These actions below are subject to disqualification after immediate notice.- Sharing FLAG values or challenge solutions- Preventing other people from having fun(including DoS, DDoS, etc)- Brute Forcing FLAG values to *.codegate2022.org FLAG system- Intentionally prevent other teams from flagging.- Ignore the qualifications to participate to participate the other division.(General person who pretends to be a university student participate in the University Division.)
4. If you find any bug in system, report to [email protected]
5. After preliminary round, you must submit it by [email protected] within 24 hours.
6. Participants who must submit are write-ups:- General Division : top 15 teams- University Division : top 15 teams- Junior Division : top 25 teams
7. There is no necessary to set up VPN to play CODEGATE 2022 CTF.
8. Official Channel : Discord
9. After Preminary Round ends, The Scoreboard doesn't confirm final teams to go Final Round. Final teams will be announced.
10. Final Round teams are- Junior Division : top 20 teams- University Division : 10 teams(top 9 teams, 1 team from last winner)- General Division : 10 teams(top 9 teams, 1 team from last winner)

Mentor High School's CTF challenge! Open to anyone, anywhere (eligibility rules exist for prizes).
Thanks to our sponsors:- Wolfram Research- Binary Ninja- Trail of Bits- Hak5
Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/XPk6xTDtFV
Participants will get an access to the cyber security tournament system and they will have 24 hours to solve CTF challenges.

Win $5,000 in prizes from DiceCTF 2022, a cybersecurity competition by DiceGang!
Join our Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/CbCXtrDE5m?event=935026219014037520

Categories will be Crypto, Forensic, Pwn, Reverse and Web.
There will be no bonus points so the final ranking will be determined based on the time of the last challenge solved, ie first come first served.

There's a first time for everything.For Bangladesh and for Knight Squad as well, it's the first time to conduct an International CTF competition.
Yeah, you read that right!
Knight Squad is gonna conduct an International CTF competition on January 20, 2022.
There will be challenges with basic concepts which transition into more complex and advanced challenges, ensuring that everyone has something that they can enjoy.
Event Website : https://knightctf.com/
Discord : https://discord.gg/6KayH7cRAP
